---
name: repository-onboarding
description: "Onboard new repositories with GitHub Copilot agent intelligence"
prompt: |
  Bootstrap complete agent intelligence system in new repository:
  1. Create .github/ structure
  2. Generate copilot-instructions.md
  3. Set up instruction files
  4. Create agents/prompts/skills
  5. Configure validation
  
  Use templates from .github/specs/agent-intelligence-framework.md
tools: ['*']
